title: Convert DWORD to String with Length Limitation
description:
DWORD_TO_STRF converts a DWORD, Word or byte in a STRING of fxed
length. The output string is exactly N digits, with leading zeros inserted or
leading digits truncated. The maximum permitted length N is 20 digits.
name: DWORD_TO_STRF

input.name: IN
input.description: The DWORD value to be converted to a string.

input.name: N
input.description: The maximum length of the resulting string, which should be limited to a maximum of 20.

return_value.description: The resulting string representation of the DWORD input, limited to the specified length N.
